ThingDef.label: forklift egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized forklift egg. Don't think about it too much. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: forklift egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized forklift egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a forklift. Don't think about it too much. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
